website_summaries.verdict: Rare and distinguished Rolex chronograph with Triplock triple-waterproofing system and brown ceramic bezel.
pros: Accurate Swiss automatic self wind movement, and water resistant for up to 100 meters
cons: Dial is busy and may be hard to read

customer_reviews.title: I can always have more kids!
customer_reviews.text: It was this watch or buying my first house! This was an easy choice! I went with the watch. Best Decision of my life. Yes motel jumping is awesome! When my kids are hungry I just let them lick the watch! I have different Neighbors each week. This decision was so smart that I’m going to buy three more. Just waiting for the deal to go thru when I sell my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good watch though
customer_reviews.text: Was very upset when I was digging in my crack and the watch got stuck up my butt. Can’t get the shine back.
customer_reviews.author: Karma H.

customer_reviews.title: Buying a $60, 000 watch with no manufacture warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying a $60,000 watch with no manufacture warranty nor proof of authenticity from a third party seller -- one must me nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R.

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: In May 2016 I bought a solar powered Casio watch for $35 from Amazon. Two and a half years later and I've yet to adjust the time and the sun powers it. For $35.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, but not $69k (nice)
customer_reviews.text: After starting in the prostitution industry at the age of 8 (as a white male), I was given the choice between freedom or this watch. Well, Im here writing this review because I chose the right thing. Definitely worth the 67k. I recommend adding another 2 grand to this watch price. If ima be spending 67k I can afford another 2. I am no longer able to afford heating and cooling in my brothel anymore but the ice on my wrist keeps us cool in the summer. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy hed

customer_reviews.text: I only will have to give eating for 45 years.

customer_reviews.title: I got arrested for this
customer_reviews.text: I thought selling my lungs will allow me to afford this masterpiece! Yet, I got arrested for selling seven lungs. IDK what's wrong with this society. At least I got a watch, that's a good thing.

customer_reviews.title: Uggly& no one will ever know it's platniun
customer_reviews.text: Platinum Datona, you have to be kidding!!! Looks like a uggly tutor cosmograph in stainless steel, but with a but uggly dial!!! If I owened one of those, I would smash it to pieces& sell it for scrap metal to D.H. Fell in California!!!! This is as uggly as the yaht masters, explorer 2's& the air Kings!!! Buy submariner's, Datona's in stainless steel, two tone, or solid 18 kt gold!! Look how long they have been trying to get ride of this turkey!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch but not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to go with a high-end Rolex, go with the Platinum 41mm Watch with Diamond Roman Numeral Hour Markers. The two watches are functionally identical, and you can use the $8,000 you saved to coax the homeless into bare-knuckle boxing for your entertainment pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sold my car for this, I don't regret taking the bus while flexing the watch to peasants

customer_reviews.title: Cool Watch
customer_reviews.text: Cool watch but I ended up getting an Apple Watch instead and threw this is the trash cause the Apple has a screen and this watch is older.

product_meta.title: Rolex Oyster Perpetual Cosmograph Daytona Ice Blue Dial Automatic Mens Chronograph Watch 116506
product_meta.description:
Rolex Cosmograph Daytona Platinum chronograph men's watch equipped with Swiss-made calibre 4130 automatic movement. The 40mm platinum case and bezel with chestnut brown cerachrom insert features an ice blue dial with chestnut brown counters and scratch-resistant sapphire crystal. Minute markers located on outer rim. Chronograph function includes three sub-dials displaying 12 hours, 30 minutes and 60 seconds. Other functions include hours, minutes and seconds. The strap is made of platinum with platinum folding buckle. This watch is water resistant to 10ATM (100m or 330 feet) and has a power reserve of 72 hours.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :10 x 7.8 x 5.1 inches; 15.84 Ounces
 * Date First Available :July 1, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Rolex 2013
 * ASIN :B01MR0ROVO
